inn1.comm: shapes away from the batsman, left alone by Karthik
on target, no swing so far, Amla defends off the front foot
square-driven, nicely timed, but not wide of backward point
punched away nicely, good connection, but not past cover
drops and runs, good early call, takes Raina - cover - on, but it's an early call that sees him through
full delivery, on off, pushed back to the bowler
full ball on the pads, flicked away past square leg
stays full again, around off, no movement, hit back to the bowler
nicely played, upper-cut over point, it is short and wide, and he almost takes six off. In the Test series, Amla played one shot in the air, and here in an ODI he goes aerial in the second over
fuller, on off, played to short cover
back of a length, around off, open face, can't get it past short point
oversteps... looks to tuck him up on the pads, and it's called no-ball - he has landed behind the line and slid onto it
flat-bats the free hit back at the bowler, who gets his hands onto it but can't catch it - the fumble costs him a single
back of a length, into the pads, swivel-pulls it, fine leg is very square, gets him a couple
full and wide, hit one-bounce to short cover
stops a touch at Amla who checks the shot and keeps it down, hitting it towards mid-on
straying onto the pads, and Amla misses out on this offering, the ball rolls off the pad towards Dhoni
runs this one down to third man
short, looks for the cut, doesn't get enough room for the shot, plays it one bounce to point
diving save by Dinesh Karthik at short cover, was hit well by Amla
looks to work it off the pads, can't get it past midwicket
misses out on the big pull shot, short and outside off, Amla goes for the full-blooded pull, but the ball comes on too slowly
full delivery, hit powerfully, another good reflex save by Karthik at short cover
short-arm pull, the ball didn't come on, nor did it rise high, Amla went for the short-arm shot and swivelled as he made contact, nicely played
driven down the ground, can't get it past mid-on
nicely pushed down the ground, on the up, full face of the bat, lovely timing, beats mid-off
slight inward seam movement, back of a length and comes back in, played to mid-on
opens the face, plays it wide of backward point, easy single taken
good timing, driven down the ground, straight to mid-off, though
slower legcutter, it turns away like a proper legbreak, and beats Amla on the cut
wristily driven down the ground, can't beat mid-on
inside edge stifles a possible lbw shout here
nice shot, always knew he was going over the top, got under a length delivery, extended his arms and hit it through the line, over mid-on
hit to the right of that very man, but no runs
driven powerfully, straight to Raina at cover
full delivery on the pads, a gift really, and flicked away for four to square leg
goes short and wide, and is cut away, square of third man, another nice shot
the flood gates are open, wristily flicked away, back of a length, and from in front of the stumps he hits a four to square leg. Four fours in last seven deliveries
better length, slightly fuller, but still not driving length, pushed to cover
can't beat that man at short cover again, and Dinesh karthik is quick there, making Bosman rush back into his crease at the non-striker's end
crashed away square of the wicket, Kohli at backward point fumbles, giving away the single
caught off a no-ball! the short midwicket plan almost worked, but Sreesanth overstepped! Bosman whipped it off his pads, in the air, Yusuf takes a nice catch, but realises late that this is a no-ball
wide yorker, Bosman backs away and ends up far from it, and the free hit doesn't hurt them much in terms of runs
follows it up with a poor delivery, full and on the pads, and flicked past short fine leg for four, easy pickings
starts off short and wide, but Amla is early into the cut shot, the ball not coming on well
bowls wide of the crease, short of a length, angling in, punched to point
flat-bats this one across the line, gets power in, but can't get it past mid-on
short and wide again, and Amla misses out on the cut again, slightly extra bounce this time
length ball on the pads, and nicely, beautifully flicked past mid-on, and superb timing on it
he has been asking to be hit this over, and Amla obliges this time. It is short and wide again, and he waits that extra half second and makes connection, goes in front of point and gets four
what a shot! The Hammer hammers! Gets under a short delivery and plays the pick-up pull, into the crowd behind the square-leg fence
slower ball, offcutter this time, better length too - full but not driveable, inside edge onto the pad
hits that length again, around off, defended towards short cover
slower legcutter gone wrong, ends up being a fulltoss on the pads, and he is literally swept away. With fine leg up, that line is a crime really. Was he looking to bowl him around his legs?
opens the face, shows a wide delivery through to third man
Amla gets the single to third man this time, another good over for South Africa
Rohit Sharma misses out on a direct-hit from mid-on, Amla was gone had he hit. Poor call after having hit straight to the fielder, off the back foot that too
swipes across the line and misses, back of a length it was and bounced nicely
full and wide, driven powerfully, one bounce to short point
shortish, wide of  off, opens the face and gets a single to third man
moves across pretty early, whips a length delivery, can't beat square leg
superb placement, driven on the up, and through a tight off side ring, beating short cover and point, and then regulation cover and point
and he too bowl short and wide, and gets away with it, with the springy bounce that beats Bosman
short and wide again, cut away, but there's a deep point in place - in a strange sense of way, a poor delivery but bowled to his field
punch-drive, nicely on the up, wide of mid-off, Jadeja makes a diving save
drilled back at Tyagi who gets a hand to it, but they come through for one off the ricochet
another drive wide of mid-off, Jadeja does well gain to keep them down to one
mistimes the pull shot, but the top edge falls safe in the deep on the leg side - before deep backward square can come around, they take two
helped away to third man for a single, Amla seems in
and Hammer misses out on a leg-side offering, short ball too, and he is just early into the sot
makes nice use of the gift this time, Mithun goes wide of the crease, and bowls a length delivery on the pads, and it is lofted over midwicket
short this time, but still angling into the pads, Sreesanth at short fine makes a fine diving save, saving three runs
much better delivery, back of a length, around off, not giving him any room, pushed to cover
punched on the up, straight towards Raina at cover
flat delivery on stumps, hit to cover
slight turn for Jadeja, crashed away square, Raina makes a superb diving save - to his left that too
Bosman caught on the back foot, and this fullish delivery turns and beats his cut shot
pushes this one down to long-off for a single
opens the face, pushes a length delivery with the turn and past point
angling into the pads, and helped away for a single towards square leg
and is Hammered away first ball, what a clean straight hit, and what a way to get to fifty, lovely extension of arms and goes over long-on
flighted wide of off, crashed straight to cover
powerfully driven again, wide of mid-off, but Jadeja does a good job
Amla plays along, places it wide of cover, and brings Bosman back on strike
another powerful drive, straight to Kohli at extra cover
flat delivery, pushed to mid-off, and he scrambles through for a quick single
Boss Man goes big again, steps out and lofts him over long-off, and there is a fielder there, but he is just a spectator here
drives down the ground again, along the ground this time, gets a single
Amla steps out too, hits it back to Jadeja
this one turns sharply, the thick edge runs past slip and they come back for two
angled into the pads, driven wide of mid-on, hands over the strike to Bosman
short of a length, hit down the ground, gets a single and retains strike
there's a long-on, there's a long-off, and he still clears them, dances down the track and gets under a length delivery again, and what a lovely straight shot
into the pads, and helped away to fine leg for one
hit to wide of mid-on to bring back Bosman on strike
Bosman is gone! His attacking instincts get him. He takes on long-off again, but gets more height than distance here, and holes out. What a nice little gem The Hammer has played
flicks it off the pads, can't beat square leg
places this one nicely, wide of point, gets a single
nicely pushed wide of cover, and early call gets him a single
full ball on the pads, pushed to mid-on
presses forward and defends a full delivery to cover
on the front foot, drives with an open face, can't beat point
another drive straight to cover
turn here, from middle and leg, takes, the edge, that falls short of slip
driven down to long-on for a single
Kallis off the mark, placed with soft hands wide of point
another single, soft hands in play again, nicely placed wide of point
flat delivery onto the pads, flicked away, finds square leg
places this one wide of cover and comes through for one
shorter delivery, punched away, can't beat the off-side ring
flat delivery on off, pushed away, gets one
nicely played, steps out of the crease, goes inside out, beats extra cover, gets two
fifty for Amla, opens the face on a flat delivery, past point
presses forward and defends it back to the bowler
defended into the covers this time
driven down to long-off for one
on the pads, pushed down to long-on
into the pads, and helped away towards square leg
smeared into the pads, misses out, stifled shout but going down
takes a half-shimmy, and flicks this one off the pads, gets a single
pushed down to long-on for another single
short, outside off, punched to sweeper-cover
into the pads, misses out but gets a leg bye
another single, helped away off the pads, take a second off the ricochet off a direct hit
presses forward and defends a turning delivery back to the bowler
looks to come down the track, Jadeja bowls it in flat and fast, stays in the crease and gets a single to long-off
goes for the big pull, mistimes, but gets a single to square leg
into the pads, Kallis finds square leg again
pulls in the air, doesn't connect well, one bounce to deep square leg
helped away towards fine leg, Amla is on auto pilot for singles
short, outside off, hit powerfully, can't get it past Kohli at cover
swept away, gets a single to deep fine leg
keeps on with the middle-and-leg line, Amla's flick finds midwicket
full toss, square-driven, but for a single to deep point
full and wide, gets a single to deep point
length ball, driven on the up, down to long-off
slower ball, on the pads, turned around the corner for one
leg-stump half-volley, pushed down the ground
short of a length, on the leg stump, played straight to square leg
Yusuf is hurt in the had, collides with Amla while fielding, and the head goers into Amla's rib cage, and Yusuf comes down holding the back of his head
and Raina makes a full-length diving save at midwicket, lovely fielding
inside edge as Kallis looks for a big drive into the off side, there is turn there
shimmies down the track and gets a single down to long-on
first boundary since Bosman got out! shortish, widish, makes room, and guides it backward of square, uses the field placings well
turning into him, played straight to midwicket
slower delivery, dabs it to third man for a single
length ball, driven with an open face, Raina is good at cover again
another slower ball, pushed down to long-on for one
square-drive, nice followthrough, gets a single to deep point
uses his wrists on this one, places it between deep fine and deep square, gets two
drags this one short, lucky that it is pulled straight to deep square leg
shimmies down, pushes it wide of long-on, gets one
late cut, gets one to short third man
driven down the ground, Kohli runs and dives from extra cover, another single saved
this time Kohli hasn't to do any running or diving, this one is hit straight to him at extra cover
poor delivery, half-tracker, Amla rocks back and pulls it between deep square and deep midwicket
opens the face and places this one wide of point
looks to dab it to third man, the slowness of the ball takes it to point
short and wide again, and Amla misses out on the the cut shot
punched away wide of cover, Raina makes a half stop diving to his left
slower ball, Kallis plays it with soft hands, and gets a single to backward point
low bounce, Amla looks to pull from outside off, and it stays low and squeezes underneath his bat
better delivery, on target, hit to the left of Mithun who stretches well and keeps them from taking a single
and big turn right away, from wide of off, surprises Kallis who is hit on the glove in front of middle and off
looks for the big sweep from outside off, is beaten as this one doesn't turn as much
goes deep into the crease, and turns this one around the corner for one
cuts this away fine from wide outside off, past short third, gets a couple
single to sweeper-cover, nicely punched away
flat delivery into the pads, uses the bowler's pace and gets it past short fine and gets two
stops at Amla who checks the shot and gets a single to long-off
nice square drive from wide of off, gets a single to deep point
short and wide, helped away to third man
walks down the track, punches it on the up, gets a single to sweeper-cover
fulltoss, walks across the stumps, gets a single down to long-on
beautifully driven, on the up, wide of long-off, comes back for two
wide yorker, plays it with an open face, gets a single
short, around off, opens the face, gets one to third man
short, nicely pulled away, Mithun at deep square does well to cut it off and keep them down to one
just back of a length, comes forward and defends to cover
driven on the up, can't beat Raina again, he has been good at cover
short delivery, too close to cut, the bottom edge goes one bounce to Dhoni
short and wide and cut away, fine of deep point, gets two
straighter this time, but makes room again, and gets a single to deep point
comes down the track, gets too close to the pitch, so can't get under it, but gets a single to long-off
inside-edged towards midwicket, Rohit gets turn again
driven against the turn, past cover, gets a single to sweeper-cover

Kallis goes for the big shot into the leg side, M Vijay misjudges, runs in too far, and he has been lobbed for four! Pretty embarrassing for the boundary fielder when the ball goes over him and still lands inside the boundary
full and wide, driven to deep point for one
nicely driven on the up, wide of long-off, gets a couple
full toss, knee-high, around off, pushed down to long-off for one
back of a length, flicked, but not past midwicket
another full toss, higher this time, hit to point, no signal from umpires - not waist high
full delivery on off stump, hit straight to cover
flat, into the pads, defended towards midwicket
pushed down to long-on, gets a single
whipped away from in front of stumps, not placed as well, and finds midwicket
another diving save from Raina at extra cover
Amla perishes! a string of dot balls against him, and he plays the adventurous slog sweep, gets a top edge and holes out to deep square leg
short, punched to sweeper-cover
into the pads, and turned around the corner for one
and starts off with a single to third man
and another single down to third man, open-faced
full delivery, driven nicely, one bounce to Karthik at cover
near-yorker, on the pads, played straight to midwicket
yorker, just outside off, beats his open face
length delivery, pushed down to long-off
into the pads, helped away to fine leg for a single
full delivery, driven down to long-off for one
low fulltoss, almost squeezes through, gets a bottom edge
tossed up around off, defended back to to the bowler
smeared into the pads, makes room, and hits it wide of cover for one
and he is short and wide again, and is cut away wide of deep point for two
looks to run this one down to third man, but ends up playing it to point
into the pads, pulled away and does well to come back for two, having hit it just to the right of deep square leg
shimmies down the track, plays with an open face, past point, gets a single
leg-stump half-volley, and flicked to deep square leg
good yorker, hit back to the bowler, who finds AB as he has a hit at the stumps
on target, Kallis looks to play it to third man but there is no room
drops it just off the wicket and gets a single, early call and quick scramble
flat into the pads, helped around the corner for one
full, on middle, hit back to Jadeja on the bounce
full again, hit down to long-on for one
lovely shot, it was smeared into the pads, he made room and went inside-out over extra cover, always good to watch that shot
drop and run again, just wide of Dhoni, but they come through for one
another boundary for AB, asking to be hit, though. Short, into the leg side, and AB obliges with the pull
top edge as he goes across the line, but it falls short of third man
cut away nicely, gets a single to deep point
inside edge onto the pad as he walks across and looks to flick this
lovely straight drive, but will get him just a single to long-off
yorks him around off, hit back to the bowler
hit down the ground, gets a single to long-on
short and flat, hit down the ground, will get one
into the pads, gets a couple wide of fine leg
plays with an open face, past point, gets one
short and pulled away, wide of deep midwicket
plays with an open face, gets a single to third man, gets to his fifty
nice yorker, slower ball that too, AB can't do anything with it
bowls length, and is punished, superb shot, driven between mid-off and extra cover
another beautiful shot! Long-off has been sent back, but still AB manages to drive it wide of him, lovely drive and even better placement
this time it is driven straight down the ground and will fetch him just one
poor delivery, digs it in short, at not much pace, and is pulled to deep midwicket for four
moves about in the crease, misses a straight delivery, gets a leg-bye
hit down to wide of mid-off for one
flat and shortish on off, pushed with an open face for one to sweeper-cover
Kallis places this to wide of point for one
makes room, punches to wide of sweeper-cover, gets two
makes room again, Jadeja follows him, he sweeps this one to midwicket, gets one
pulled to deep square leg for one
angled into the pads, worked away for one
fired into the pads, flicked over the leg-side infield, will get just one
tucks him up with the angle again, just a single
goes for the pull shot, gets the bottom part of the bat, again just a single
makes room, Yusuf follows him and yorks him, just a single
and pushed down for a single again
AB comes down the track, is beaten in the flight, but slices it past point, gets two
first boundary in PP! gets down on a knee and slogs it past midwicket
makes room and drives this one past point, just a single
Kallis hits down to mid-on and takes a single
full toss, misses out, can't beat Raina at extra cover, and they can't even get the single
another solid drive along the ground by Kallis, gets AB on strike
fired into the pads with a strong on-side field, gets a single
nice shot! flat around off, short too, punched into the covers, nicely placed, despite being on the front foot
full ball, driven down to long-on
lovely way to bring up his 50! makes room for another delivery fired way down the leg side, and cuts it into the off side where no one is patrolling the boundary
lofts this one down the ground, it bounces in front of long-on, gets a single
AB walks across the stumps, but Sree is full and wide and manages a dot ball
walks across again, drags this one from wide of off towards mid-on, can't time it, and gets only a single
slower-ball, fulltoss outside off, hit hard but straight to long-off
walks across and hits a wide delivery to extra cover, would have been a wide had he not hit, would have been run out had Raina hit the one stump he could see. Woulda-coulda-shoulda delivery
this time Kallis plays at a delivery that would have been a wide if left alone, gets a limp bottom edge for one
full and wide, and this time AB tries the percentage shot as opposed to going into the on side. And he connects so well that he clears the sweeper-cover, lovely timing on this one
Tyagi comes back with a poor delivery, full toss on the pads, and it is timed very well, straight over long-on
length delivery, on off, hit down to long-off
nice shot, lovely shot, gets under a length delivery, and goes over extra cover, timing, placement, all perfect
he has slog-swept a fast bowler! takes this low fulltoss and deposits it in the stand behind midwicket, superb batting. The yorker went off by just a fraction
slower ball, beats him this time outside off by the change of pace
goes over point, finds the gap between sweeper-cover and third man, enough time for him to come back for two
low fulltoss, inches fuller of being a yorker, gets a single to long-off
slower legbreak, hit in the air and down the ground, Mithun runs in from long-on but at the wrong angle and has almost over-run it, the desperate dive in the end doesn't save four
gets the yorker right, just a single results
good yorker, another single, with an open face, towards point
yorker becomes low full toss again, drilled down the ground, Rohit dives and fields, replays it to Raina who throws, and thus the batsmen are kept down to one
driven straight down the ground, and before Raina can get around from long-on, they come back for two
and starts off porrly with a low fulltoss on the pads with fine leg up, AB cahses in and overtakes Kallis
misfielded by Yusuf at extra cover, it goes right through him as he dives, coming down ever so slowly on the ball. London Bridge and all that

gets the yorker right this time, still he squeezes it down towards square leg, and AB comes back for two. Jadeja does well but with a flat and fast throw, Dhoni disturbs one bail while taking the throw, and in the next frame AB is in even as the second bail comes off
dances down the track, flat-bats it down to long-off, will be just a single
low full toss outside off, and Kallis drills it straight of extra cover and wide of long-off, superb placement
poor delivery again, wide and full toss, and Kallis is no mood of forgiving such mistakes, goes inside-out over extra cover
low fulltoss on off, hit powerfully to sweeper-cover, AB wants two, but Kallis doesn't want to risk Jadeja's arm
length ball, drilled down to long-on, just a single
slower legcutter again, Ab reacds it early, goes inside-out, with the turn, gets one to sweeper-cover. Sree wants Jadeja to run in and catch, jadeja wants to stay back and save four
low fulltoss, hit down the ground, wide of long-on, gets two
good shot, goooood shot! gets under a length ball, hits it damn straight and powerfully, into the sight screen
another beautiful shot to bring up his hundred and SA's 350, again gets a length ball, and goes inside-out, clearing long-off with ease, well-paced innings
full delivery, hit down the ground for one
Kallis drives it to long-on, gives AB the strike to try and get his hundred
and AB gets close too with a six! length ball fired into the pads and he lofts it over midwicket, lovely timing
and he gets to the seventh-fastest hundred in ODIs! Dances down the track, takes it on the full, and hits it to the midwicket boundary, what a crazy little innings
full ball, drilled to long-on for a single
full and low, goes for inside-out drive, is beaten, and it has been a superb finish despite the final dot ball

inn2.comm: shaping away and left alone
nicely played, very well timed, using Steyn's pace, with an open face and through point
angled down the pads, misses out, but gets two leg byes
leaves this one alone wide outside off
short, not too wide, he cuts but doesn't get enough room to place it well
again swing away from DK, he presses forward and leaves it alone
full ball, angling across, stops a touch, Vijay checks his shot, takes the bottom hand off
angled across him, Vijay plays and misses, Tsotsobe appeals late, but he is the only person convinced of an edge
lovely shot, leans into this full delivery, and drives it past cover, nice way to get first runs in ODIs
lovely shot again! this time full on the pads, and he flicks it past square leg, elegant shot again
pulls the length back a bit, Vijay is on the front foot and pushes it back to Tsotsobe
back of a length, angled across Vijay, who pushes it to cover
Steyn gets this one to nip in sharply, and beats Karthik, but the lbw is out of question as this one is sliding down the leg
nicely helped away with the angle, past square leg, gets three
short, tucks him up, Karthik calls him for a sharp leg-bye
crunched away through covers, on the up, gets on the front foot and he finds the gap past short cover
pulls the length back a bit, hit powerfully, but one bounce to short cover
slower ball, well bowled, 127ks, and Karthik is early into the shot, and ends up hitting straight to Amla at mid-off. First breakthrough
shot of the match! Beautiful! stands tall, shows a full delivery the full face of the bat, what an off drive! Half-volley all right, but what a good-looking shot
bowls short this time, tucks him up
uppishly flicked away, not in complete control but manages to land it in safe area
drops and runs, back of a length, and he plays it with soft hands and runs hard
defends this off the front foot, bowled short of good length and gives him no room
pushed with an open face, connects well, can't beat point, though
takes a quick single, playing it towards mid-on with soft hands
presses forward, plays it towards point with an open face
good bouncer, keeps rising and rising, Kohli ducks under it
inswing, but too full and too straight, Kohli gets off the mark with a single to deep fine leg
angled down the leg side, and with his pace, you need just a tickle, and Vijay gets it
another good slower ball outside off, Vijay checks the shot but he gets an edge that falls short of slip
and immediately he guides it past where slip would have been, good shot
that's a brute, dug in short, Vijay is on the front foot, and the ball rises and kisses his glove on the way. Very well bowled Tsotsobe, surprised Vijay who is primarily a front-foot batsman
back of a length, outside off, defended
short, into the body, pulled towards fine leg
stays back of a length, Kohli pushes at it off the front foot
short, punched away nicely, Gibbs is quick at short cover
short outside off, Rohit shoulders arms
full, around off, hit with an open face towards point
short, rising, Sharma gets tall, and fends, does well to keep it down
tucks him up, Sharma misses on the flick, gets a leg bye
Steyn stays short, in his face, defended towards on
finishes his third over in a row with a slower delivery, Kohli defends it off the front foot
angled across Rohit, who presses forward and defends
short again, Sharma gets an inside edge onto the pads
pitches it up, the sucker delivery, gets a thick edge, but past slip
leading edge as Kohli's bat turns too early to leg, but it lands safe and wide of short cover
wide delivery, Kohli throws the kitchen sink at it and misses
nicely flicked away off the hips, stands tall, gets inside the line and places it past square leg
nicely played by Sharma, gets on his toes, uses all Morkel's pace and guides it past point
fuller on the off stump, defended back to the bowler
presses forward and pushes this to wide of mid-on, gets a single
short again, outside off, steered away to third man
good pace, short, on the stumps, pushes him deep into the crease, but Sharma defends this one well
angling into the pads, and his bat face turns too early, and he misses out on this one
length delivery, hit wide of mid-on
short, and he murders it! Gets on top of it, and pulls it along the ground, and into the gap past square leg
slower ball, offcutter, gets a thick edge, but it falls short of slip
nicely flicked away, from in front of the stumps, gets it wide of mid-on for one
short and angled away from him, and he cuts it powerfully towards third man
back of a length, defended towards cover
looks to tuck him up, but he manages to get it wide of mid-on for one
is beaten as he looks to play it square on the leg side, hit around the thigh pad area
and again he misses out on a leg-side short delivery, beaten on the pace again
fuller outside off this time, Sharma presses forward and defends
angling into the pads, flicked away, but not past midwicket
nicely punched away, but finds the fielder again, mid-off this time
length ball on the pads, played to wide of mid-on, gets a single
looks to tuck him, worked away towards fine leg for one
nicely punched down the ground, gets a single straight of mid-off
keeps the pull down, took his eye off but managed to keep it down and gets a single
slower ball, flicked away off the pads, and takes a couple to wide of square leg
another short delivery, stays inside the line and sways out
back of a length, punched to cover
angled into the pads, but the extra bounce from his height keeps the batsman honest
fuller this time, easily flicked away to square leg for one

oh oh oh! de Villiers and Kallis collide, head to head! what a brute of a delivery it is first of all, short and takes the edge as the batsman looks to duck, and Kallis from slip and de Villiers from backward point run for the catch and dive into each other
punched off the front foot, not past point, though
full, on the pads, flicked away towards square leg
full ball, on the stumps, driven down to extra cover
on the stumps again, pushed to midwicket
shorter, not much room, cut straight to backward point
full and straight, gets a single to long-off
yorks him, tosses it up nicely, yorker length it turns out to be
pushed down the ground, gets a single to long-off
punched to cover, can't find the gap
nicely driven away, inside out, over extra cover, just over, but four runs nonetheless
goes back to bowling short of a length, this time they pinch a single to cover
nicely pulled away, expecting a short delivery and rocks back and gives it his full power, wide of midwicket, all along the ground
plays and misses outside off, and lets out a big grunt for playing a loose shot
looks to run this one down to third man, can't get it past Boucher
pushes at this one, gets the outside half of the bat, takes a single
leading edge as he looks to whip it towards midwicket, there is turn and it goes wide of cover
turned around the corner, gets a single
Gibbs at midwicket makes a superb diving save and makes Kohli dive to get back in - and he has not taken more than three steps
driven inside out, powerfully, one bounce to extra cover
helped towards deep point, Steyn charges onto the ball, fumbles, and that allows them to come back for the second
played with soft hands towards mid-off, they scramble through for one
fuller delivery, driven back to Morkel
steers this one down to third man for a single
angled into the pads, gets an inside edge onto the pad, gets a single
slower ball, flicked to wide of mid-on, comes through for one
full and straight, played to extra cover for one
angled down the leg side, called a wide
into the pads again, helped around the corner
presses forward, pushes this one down to long-off
full again, gets a single to long-off
smeared into the pads, hit back straight, van der Merwe makes a diving save
full and straight, hit down the ground for one
angled into the pads again, hit straight to short fine
turn right away, patted to the right of Boucher
dances down the wicket, helps it towards fine leg for one
presses forward, flicks it to midwicket
punched down the ground for one
opens the face outside off, gets a single to short third
full delivery into the pads, hit straight to midwicket
accurate delivery, played back to the bowler
nicely hit inside out, and de Villiers from extra cover runs back makes a good diving save too
flat and straight, hit back to the bowler
short outside off, hit into the covers
dances down the track and hits it powerfully straight down the ground, Tsotsobe makes a nice diving save again
into the pads, helped away towards deep midwicket for one
angled into the pads, played back to the bowler
full delivery, flicked off the pads
shimmies down the track, Botha pulls the length back, but he gets one to wide of midwicket
angled into the pads, helped away towards fine leg
another single into the on side
turned away off the pads, gets one to short fine
fired into the pads, defended back to the bowler
punched down the ground, gets a single
makes room, and plays a nice-looking inside-out chip over extra cover
fired into the pads again, helped around the corner for one
punched hard but straight to extra cover
hit down the ground, in the air but wide enough of van der Merwe - gets a single
nicely tossed up outside off, drags it from outside off, gets a single to long-on
short, pulled down the ground, another single
nicely played, good shot, full delivery, gets under it and clears midwicket inside the circle,
helped away off the pads, gets a single
Sharma shimmies down but hits this straight to midwicket
swept away, gets a single to fine leg
short, backs away, and hits this past extra cover for two
fired down the leg side and called wide
driven away to sweeper-cover for one
not short enough, but he still times the cut well, not past point, though
Kohli looks to step down the track, van der Merwe fires it in, dot ball
punched away powerfully, gets a single to sweeper-cover
shimmies down the track, and places it into the midwicket gap, but Amla makes a diving save
short, into the pads, flicked away for one
nicely chipped once again, picking the midwicket gap again, gets a copule
goes for midwicket again, but ends up cow corner, and long-on is wide, keeping them to one
steps out of the crease, punched down to wide long-on
comes down the track, can't get this past midwicket
he has deposited a leg-side full toss straight down deep square leg's throat. Sharma goes back looking painfully at the toe end of his bat, Tsotsobe and Botha are delighted, though
Kohli plays and misses outside off
steered to third man for a single
slower bouncer outside off, Dhoni wants to have nothing to do with it
full delivery, accurate too, gets a thick outside edge for a single
another thick edge, this time Kohli is looking it to force through cover and gets the edge - anyway, it takes him to 50!
slower ball, Kohli is early, and then checks his shot, playing one bounce back to the bowler
what a shot! take that! Dhoni steps out of the crease, and wallops it over long-on. Continuing from where he left in Gwalior?
worked off the pads, gets a single
Kohli goes for it this time, and he gets it even bigger, with the turn, over wide long-on
guides this flatter delivery to short third for one
worked around the corner, gets another single
full toss, hit straight to midwicket
goes for the big heave, misses, ends up playing inside the line
what a superb effort from Boucher! looks to whip this to on side, gets a big edge and Boucher dives full length to his right to pull this off one-handed

lbw shout first up against Raina, and he seems to have got away with one! half of the ball pitched inside the line, beat his poke, and got him right in front, and Steyn gives the umpire the most vicious look he can muster
worked away off the pads, gets a single to square leg
bouncer, and Kohli gets under it
edged and taken! Steyn gets another! Kohli looks to steer this one down to third man, the bowl holds its line a touch, and gets a regulation edge for a regulation catch for Boucher
slog-swept right away, over midwicket, and he gets four
goes inside-out, doesn't get it right, but manages a single one bounce to wide long-off
hits a full delivery down to long-on for one

dropped, almost another collision, top-edges this slog-sweep, and Amla from deep midwicket and Morkel from long-on converge, no calling and both hold back and let it fall safely. Amla gets a hand to it, but the collision is averted more importantly
full, fast, furious yorker, misses off stump as Raina looks to open the face
fired in again, beats him on the slog-sweep, going down the leg so only a stifled appeal
runs this one down to third man for one
worked away off the pads, gets one
misses on the cut shot, outside off, bounces twice through to Boucher
tucked into the hips, helped away for one
full delivery, hit straight to mid-on
cramps him up with one aimed at his ribs, fended towards midwicket
bunted to wide of cover for one
cut from in front of leg stump, a fumble by van der Merwe after a bad bounce turns zero into two
pushed down to long-off for one
drilled away to deep midwicket for one
big big six, his favourite slog-sweep, this time connects it properly and clears midwicket
quicker, flatter, and Raina misses as he looks to turn it to leg
big appeal right away, for a catch down the leg side, umpire Sanjay Hazare says it's off the thigh, but the replays show it is clearly off the bat, so both the batsmen have had lives via Hazare
he is gone nonetheless! slightly slower delivery, goes for the big hit straight down, gets too much under it and holes out to long-off
drives away from the body, keeps it down, straight to cover
short, tucks him up, fended, and keeps it down
length ball into the pads, helped away to get off the mark
slower ball, pushed down to long-on for one
goes for the wide yorker, goes too wide
dropped by Botha at midwicket, mis-hits a slog over midwicket, Botha goes back a couple steps and mistimes his jump
pushed down to long-on for one
short, tucks him up, no room
good shot, clears the front leg, drags it from off and goes mid-on
short, pulled in front of square, but can't beat Botha at midwicket
short and wide, drilled to deep point for one
misses out on a leg-side fulltoss with fine leg up, gets just a leg-bye
this gift voucher Raina encashes, length ball on the pads, and he goes over short fine leg
slower ball, hit to mid-off for one
big hit, down the ground, clears the front leg, clean swing, clean connection, and straight down towards the sight screen
full on the pads, gets a single to deep square leg
full toss on the stumps, slogged towards deep midwicket for one
tucks him up, but Raina gets under it and although he mis-hits he clears mid-on
goes for the big pull shot, head falls away, gets a top edge that flies over Boucher
another edge, the toe end this time, past Boucher again, safe, and Tsotsobe does well to dive full length at the third-man boundary
slower ball, low full toss, gets a single to cover
flat-batted down the ground, and Steyn at mid-on doesn't quite get down in time, and they get an extra run
full and wide, slightly too wide, especially with the angle
another edge goes for four, this time it's Jadeja who goes for the pull and somehow manages to get it over Boucher and in the V behind the stumps
and starts off with a nice fulltoss on off stump, and he finds the gap between cover and point
another full toss, hits it straight to point, and screams out a grunt of disappointment

lovely shot, full on the off stump, opens the face on this yorker and it's superbly timed, finds the gap between cover and extra cover and keeps speeding away. Gibbs makes a good chase that ends in a dive and saves them one run
hit uppishly towards long-on, gets a single
full, middle and leg, gets a single to midwicket, that partnership now reads 50 off 27 deliveries. Can they make something out of it
tucks him up with a short delivery into the ribs
absolutely drills it over mid-on, it seemed like a chance but sped past Morkel in half a second
another full toss gets Botha a wicket! on off, Raina goes inside out, but finds Parnell at wide long-off. Parnell seems to have moved in too much, but takes it nicely overhead

drilled back to Botha, the ricochet goes down the ground, Gould makes way, Parnell fields at long-off, Sree wants second, Jadeja says no, they both shake hands and go back, the throw is wide and they are safe
turns in, hits Sreesanth in the pad
full on the pads, turned away to fine leg for one
full ball on the pads, played down the ground for one
driven into the off side for one
that's a plumb lbw! bowled from round the stumps, pitches leg, turns away, beats the bat and hits him on the back leg and in front of stumps. No doubts about that
length ball, defended to on
full delivery, played back to the bowler
first international run for Mithun, turned away off the pads
full toss outside off, hit down the ground for one
full delivery, hit straight to extra cover
short ball, cut straight to sweeper-cover for one
tossed up outside off, creates a bat-pad gap, but can't squeeze it through. Inside edge onto the pad
plays inside the line of an offbreak
hits a full ball down the ground for one
works this to leg for a single
full ball, on the pads, hit to square leg
full, hit down the ground, gets a single
worked around the corner for one
plays back to a fullish delivery, gets the outside half of the bat for a single
full on the pads and flicked away to square leg
inside-out drive, gets a single to sweeper-cover
yorker outside off, beats him
that's an interesting shot, halftracker really, and he gets under it enough to clear long-on. Initially it seemed a lob to long-on but it clears Steyn
and where are we headed? Mithun goes over long-off this time, makes room and goes inside-out, and makes a lovely connection
that's a quick yorker, just about manages to dig it out
looks to paddle this one, Botha bowls his trusted full toss, an inside edge saves Mithun
Jadeja drives this full delivery down the ground, gets a single
yorker, gets it out, takes a single
another nice shot from Mithun, he has grown in confidence, inside-out again, all along the ground, gets a couple
makes room and chips this down to long-off
into the pads, helped away for a single
makes room, VDM follows him, yorks him
follows him again and yorks him again
length ball outside off, hit straight to extra cover
goes for the big shot, gets a thick edge for a single
driven to sweeper-cover for one
yorker, worked away to leg for one
full toss, misses out on it, makes no contact
short ball, makes room, plays with an open face, gets a couple to wide of third man
full ball, hit down the ground
length delivery, hit back to VDM who does well to field it

stumped off a full toss! high full toss, Mithun misses the shot, and loses balance as the ball settles in Boucher's gloves. Boucher does well to catch him in that instant. Ian Gould calls no-ball first, then signals as if to call for the TV umpire, but changes his mind and gives him out regardless. Smoewhere there he must have realised that it's a spinner bowling and hence it's a no-ball. Well done all round, Ian Gould
on target, around off, defended tentatively
gets off the mark with a lofted shot down to long-on
gets a single down to long-on
yorker on the leg stump
edged and taken! fourth catch to go with one stumping for Boucher, looks to run this down to third man and gets the edge. ODI catch No. 399 for Boucher
